trends: There have been no other sightings in Minster
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: it flew over from south west, came directly towards my house then went east
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing in my garden when i saw a bright light suddenly appear in the sky to the south west, it was heading east then it appeared to start coming towards my house then changed direction again back towards the east and just carried on, it looked to fly over the village, when i first noticed it i thought it was a bright star but it was moving, it seemed to pretty quickly but made absolutely no noise what so ever, the object was small and emmitted a brilliant white light, i was dumbstruck when i first saw it trying to figure out what it was and after it left i was excited, it seemed to change direction twice, very smoothly and it then disappeared from viewinto the clouds heading towards the town of ramsgate
